about_the_game: In this demo, explore three of Nitrojet's twelve areas. Fight three major bosses and get a sense for Nitrojet's destruction-based gameplay.
detailed_description: In this demo, explore three of Nitrojet's twelve areas. Fight three major bosses and get a sense for Nitrojet's destruction-based gameplay.
name: Nitrojet Demo
short_description: Nitrojet is a chaotic metroidvania where everything is destructible. Explore three of Nitrojet's twelve areas in this demo. Struggle against hordes of airborne beasts through sprawling ruins. Overcome the odds to take your throne as the flame-borne god of destruction.
